game

Class Scrollable

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Scrollable

  • public class Scrollable
extends java.lang.Object
    The Scrollable class shifts the background image either left or right, depending on which direction the character moves in the game.
    Author:
    Author: Nicole Spaulding

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scrollable(int speed, processing.core.PImage img, int posY, processing.core.PApplet surface)
      Creates a new movable background for the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
      Draws the PApplet.
      void setImage(processing.core.PImage image)
      Changes the background image
      void setSpeed(int speed)
      Initializes the speed of the background to amount passed in the parameter.
      void update()
      Changes the position of the background each time the character moves.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Scrollable

        public Scrollable(int speed,
                  processing.core.PImage img,
                  int posY,
                  processing.core.PApplet surface)
        Creates a new movable background for the game.
        Parameters:
        speed - How fast the background shifts left or right
        img - The background image in png form
        posY - The position of the background
        surface - PApplet to draw
